articles.title: Man Utd fans threaten LEGAL ACTION over Chelsea ticket allocation - Daily Mail
articles.description: The club had already sold their allocation of 2,994, but the Metropolitan Police sought to reduce that to 1,500 before a compromise of 2,370 was agreed after United appealed.
articles.content:
